8.2.3. ä¸­æ–­ InterruptedException å¤„ç†â€‹

thread ä¸ç«‹å³é€€å‡º, åªæ˜¯æ¥å—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­æ–­ä¿¡å·, è‡³äºæ¥æ”¶åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªä¿¡å·å¹²ä»€ä¹ˆ, æœ‰æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå·±å†™ä»£ç å†³å®š

public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {

  Thread thread = new Thread() {
      @Override
      public void run() {
          while (true) {
              if (Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {// æ”¶åˆ°ä¸­æ–­ä¿¡å·
              // æ‰§è¡Œæˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå·±çš„é€»è¾‘
                  System.out.println("æ”¶åˆ°ä¸­æ–­ä¿¡å·,åœæ­¢è¯¥çº¿ç¨‹!");
                  break;
              }
              try {
                  Thread.sleep(600);
                  // TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(60); // ä¼˜é›…çš„ ç¡çœ 
              } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                  e.printStackTrace();// sleep æ—¶å€™ è¢« interrupt, æŠ›å¼‚å¸¸, ä¼šæ¸…é™¤ interrupt æ ‡è®°, å³æ²¡æœ‰æ”¶åˆ°ä¸­æ–­ä¿¡å·
                  Thread.currentThread().interrupt();// éœ€è¦å†æ¬¡æ‰‹åŠ¨æ¢å¤ interrupt æ ‡è®°, å³æ”¶åˆ°ä¸­æ–­ä¿¡å·
              }
              System.out.println("Running!");
              Thread.yield(); // è°¦è®©
          }
      }
  };

  thread.start();
  Thread.sleep(2000);
  thread.interrupt();//è¿›è¡Œä¸­æ–­æ“ä½œ
}

8.2.4. ç­‰å¾…å’Œé€šçŸ¥-wait-notifyâ€‹

  • å¿…é¡»åœ¨ synchronized ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨, ç­‰å¾…, å”¤é†’æ“ä½œéƒ½å¿…é¡»å…ˆè·å¾—ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç›‘è§†å™¨ï¼ˆé”ï¼‰

  • ä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ - ä¼šå¹²æ‰° ç³»ç»Ÿ api å·¥ä½œ æˆ–è¢«ç³»ç»Ÿapiå½±å“, æ¯”å¦‚ join(), æœ¬è´¨å°±æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨ wait(), å¦‚æœéšä¾¿ä½¿ç”¨ wait(), ä¼šå¹²æ‰° è¿™ä¸ªapi

  • è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•å®šä¹‰ åœ¨ Object ç±» ä¸Š, ä»»ä½•å¯¹è±¡éƒ½å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨, æ¯”å¦‚: thread A calläº† obj.wait(), thread A ä¼šè¿›å…¥objçš„ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—, ç›´åˆ°å…¶ä»– thread è°ƒç”¨ äº† obj.notify(), obj ä¼šä»è‡ªå·±çš„ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­éšæœºé€‰å–ä¸€ä¸ª thread;

    è¿™æ—¶ obj å°±åƒæ˜¯ thread A B é—´çš„ é€šè®¯æ‰‹æ®µ

  • ä¸è¦ä½¿ç”¨ suspend()æŒ‚èµ·, resume()æ¢å¤ ---- å› ä¸ºè¿™æ ·æŒ‚èµ·thread é”ä¸ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾, è€Œä¸”ç”±äºæŒ‡ä»¤é‡æ’, resume()åœ¨suspend()å‰æ‰§è¡Œä¼šé€ æˆthreadæ°¸è¿œæŒ‚èµ·

/**
//wait()æ–¹æ³•ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡çš„é”,è€ŒThread.sleep()æ–¹æ³•ä¸ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾ä»»ä½•èµ„æº.
*/
public class SimpleWaitAndNotify {
    final static Object object = new Object();

    public static class Thread1 extends Thread {
        public void run() {
            synchronized (object) { // æ‰§è¡Œ wait æ–¹æ³•å‰, é¦–å…ˆè·å– object å¯¹è±¡é”
                System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + ":thread1 start !");
                try {
                    System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + ":thread1 wait for object !");
                    object.wait();// æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•å thread ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾objecté”, ç­‰å¾…, ä¸€æ—¦æœ‰ notify ä¿¡å·, åˆ™å†æ¬¡è·å– object é”, è¢«å”¤é†’
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + ":thread1 end!");
            }
        }
    }

    public static class Thread2 extends Thread {
        public void run() {
            synchronized (object) { //é¦–å…ˆè·å– object å¯¹è±¡é”
                System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + ":thread2 start ! notify one thread");
                object.notify();  

                try {
                    Thread.sleep(2000);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + ":thread2 end!");
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) {
        Thread thread1 = new Thread1();
        Thread thread2 = new Thread2();
        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();
    }
}

8.2.5. ç­‰å¾…ç»“æŸå’Œè°¦è®©-join-yieldâ€‹

threa1.join()è¡¨ç¤º thread1åŠ å…¥äº†å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ - ä¼šä½¿å¾— current thread ç­‰å¾… thread1æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯• å†æ‰§è¡Œ

public class JoinMain {

    public volatile static int i = 0;

    public static class AddThread extends Thread {
        public void run() {
            System.out.println("add!");

            for (i = 0; i < 1000000; i++) ;

            try {
                Thread.sleep(500);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {

        AddThread at = new AddThread();
        at.start();
        at.join();//ä½¿ç”¨join()æ–¹æ³•å,ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹ä¼šç­‰å¾…AddThreadæ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•,iè¾“å‡ºä¸º1000000,å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è¿™æ¡è¯­å¥,iè¾“å‡ºä¸º0
        //å¯ä»¥æŸ¥çœ‹joinçš„åº•å±‚ä»£ç ,æœ¬è´¨å³è®©è°ƒç”¨çº¿ç¨‹åœ¨å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹ä¸Šç­‰å¾…
        System.out.println(i);
    }
}

8.2.6. çº¿ç¨‹ç»„â€‹

public class ThreadGroupName implements Runnable {

    @Override
    public void run() {
        String groupAndName = 
            Thread.currentThread().getThreadGroup().getName() + "-" + Thread.currentThread().getName();
        while (true) {
            System.out.println("I am " + groupAndName);
            try {
                Thread.sleep(3000);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) {
        ThreadGroup tg = new ThreadGroup("PrintGroup");
        Thread t1 = new Thread(tg, new ThreadGroupName(), "T1");
        Thread t2 = new Thread(tg, new ThreadGroupName(), "T2");
        t1.start();
        t2.start();
        System.out.println(tg.activeCount());// æ´»åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹çš„å¤§æ¦‚æ€»æ•°
        Thread t3 = new Thread(tg, new ThreadGroupName(), "T3");
        t3.start();
        System.out.println(tg.activeCount());
        tg.list();// æ‰“å°æ‰€æœ‰çš„çº¿ç¨‹
    }
}

8.2.7. å®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹-daemonâ€‹

å½“ç³»ç»Ÿåªæœ‰ daemon thread å­˜åœ¨, jvm å°±è‡ªåŠ¨é€€å‡ºäº†

æ¯”å¦‚ GC çº¿ç¨‹, JITçº¿ç¨‹ å°±æ˜¯ daemon

å¯é€šè¿‡ thread.setDaemon(true);

public class DaemonDemo {
    public static class DaemonT extends Thread {
        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                System.out.println("I am alive");
                try {
                    Thread.sleep(1000);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * threadè¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸ºå®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹,ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­åªæœ‰ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹mainä¸ºç”¨æˆ·çº¿ç¨‹,å› æ­¤
     *åœ¨mainçº¿ç¨‹ä¼‘çœ 3ç§’é€€å‡ºæ—¶,æ•´ä¸ªç¨‹åºä¹Ÿéšä¹‹ç»“æŸ,å¦‚æœä¸æŠŠçº¿ç¨‹threadè®¾ç½®ä¸ºå®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹,
     * mainçº¿ç¨‹ç»“æŸå,tçº¿ç¨‹è¿˜ä¼šä¸åœçš„æ‰“å°,æ°¸è¿œä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šç»“æŸ.
     *
     * tip:å½“ä¸€ä¸ªJavaåº”ç”¨å†…,åªæœ‰å®ˆæŠ¤çº¿ç¨‹æ—¶,Javaè™šæ‹Ÿæœºå°±ä¼šé€€å‡º.
     *
     * @param args
     * @throws InterruptedException
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        Thread thread = new DaemonT();
        thread.setDaemon(true);
        thread.start();
        Thread.sleep(3000);

    }
}

8.2.8. çº¿ç¨‹ä¼˜å…ˆçº§â€‹

è™½ç„¶Javaçº¿ç¨‹è°ƒåº¦æ˜¯ç³»ç»Ÿè‡ªåŠ¨å®Œæˆçš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜æ˜¯å¯ä»¥â€œå»ºè®®â€ç³»ç»Ÿç»™æŸäº›çº¿ç¨‹å¤šåˆ†é…ä¸€ç‚¹æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶é—´ï¼ŒJavaè¯­è¨€ä¸€å…±è®¾ç½®äº†10ä¸ªçº§åˆ«çš„çº¿ç¨‹ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼ˆThread.MIN_PRIORITYè‡³Thread.MAX_PRIORITYï¼‰ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸¤ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åŒæ—¶å¤„äºReadyçŠ¶æ€æ—¶ï¼Œä¼˜å…ˆçº§è¶Šé«˜çš„çº¿ç¨‹è¶Šå®¹æ˜“è¢«ç³»ç»Ÿé€‰æ‹©æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œ ä½†æ˜¯ â€œå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€å®šå…ˆè¢«æ‰§è¡Œâ€

public class PriorityDemo {
    public static class HightPriority extends Thread {
        static int count = 0;

        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                synchronized (PriorityDemo.class) {//æ­¤å¤„äº§ç”Ÿèµ„æºç«äº‰
                    count++;
                    if (count > 1000000) {
                        System.out.println("HightPriority is complete!");
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }

    public static class LowPriority extends Thread {
        static int count = 0;

        public void run() {
            while (true) {
                synchronized (PriorityDemo.class) {//æ­¤å¤„äº§ç”Ÿèµ„æºç«äº‰
                    count++;
                    if (count > 1000000) {
                        System.out.println("LowPriority is complete!");
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }


    /**
     * ä½ä¼˜å…ˆçº§çš„çº¿ç¨‹å…ˆå¯åŠ¨,ä½†æ˜¯å¹¶ä¸èƒ½ä¿è¯æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½æ˜¯LowPriorityå…ˆå®Œæˆ,èµ„
     æºç«äº‰çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹è¿˜æ˜¯ä¼šå…ˆç¡®ä¿ä¼˜å…ˆçº§è¾ƒé«˜çš„çº¿ç¨‹ (è¿™é‡Œçš„çº¿ç¨‹ hight) è·å¾—èµ„æº.
     *
     * @param args
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        Thread high = new HightPriority();
        Thread low = new LowPriority();
        high.setPriority(Thread.MAX_PRIORITY);// æœ‰ 3 ä¸ªæšä¸¾é‡
        low.setPriority(Thread.MIN_PRIORITY);
        low.start();
        high.start();
    }

}

8.3. ç›¸å…³çš„å…³é”®å­—â€‹

8.3.1. volatileâ€‹

ä¿è¯å˜é‡çš„ "å¯è§æ€§(å˜é‡æ›´æ–°ç«‹å³åˆ·å…¥å †å†…å­˜å…±äº«)", "æœ‰åºæ€§(ç¦æ­¢æŒ‡ä»¤é‡æ’åº)", ä½†æ˜¯æ— æ³•ä¿è¯ "åŸå­æ€§(å˜é‡çš„è¯»å–,æ›´æ–°,ä¿å­˜å¯ä»¥ç”±ä¸€ä¸ªthreadè¿ç»­å®Œæˆ)"

    • å½“å†™ä¸€ä¸ªvolatileå˜é‡æ—¶ï¼ŒJMMä¼šæŠŠè¯¥çº¿ç¨‹å¯¹åº”çš„æœ¬åœ°å†…å­˜ï¼ˆçº¿ç¨‹æ ˆï¼‰ä¸­çš„å˜é‡å¼ºåˆ¶åˆ·æ–°åˆ°ä¸»å†…å­˜ï¼ˆå †å†…å­˜ï¼‰ä¸­å»ï¼›

public class VolatileDemo {
    static volatile int i = 0;

    public static class PlusTask implements Runnable {

        @Override
        public void run() {
            for (int j = 0; j < 10000; j++) {
                i++;// i = i + 1; è¿èƒŒäº†æ¡ä»¶ä¸€
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * volatileä¿è¯å˜é‡çš„å¯è§æ€§,ä½†æ˜¯æ— æ³•ä¿è¯ä¸€äº›å¤åˆæ“ä½œçš„åŸå­æ€§, ç°åœ¨å¯åŠ¨10ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å¯¹iè¿›è¡Œç´¯åŠ æ“ä½œ,
     * å¦‚æœä¸€åˆ‡æ­£å¸¸çš„è¯,ç»“æœåº”ä¸º100000,ä½†æ˜¯ç»“æœä¸º94875æˆ–è€…å…¶ä»–å°äº100000,å› æ­¤çº¿ç¨‹çš„å¹¶å‘ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰ä¿è¯içš„åŸå­æ€§.
     *
     * æ¯”å¦‚: åˆšå¼€å§‹, thread1, thread2 åŒæ—¶è¯»å– i=0, å„è‡ªè®¡ç®—åå¾—åˆ° i=1, å¹¶å…ˆåå†™å…¥è¿™ä¸ªç»“æœ, è¿™æ ·, è™½ç„¶ i++ æ‰§è¡Œäº† 2æ¬¡, å®é™…ä¸Š i åªå¢åŠ äº† 1
     *
     * @param args
     * @throws InterruptedException
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
        Thread[] threads = new Thread[10];
        for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
            threads[j] = new Thread(new PlusTask());
            threads[j].start();// å¤šä¸ª thread åŒæ—¶å¯¹å˜é‡ i å†™å…¥, ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿè¦†ç›– , so æœ€ç»ˆ i è¾¾ä¸åˆ° 100000
        }
        for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
            threads[j].join();// main thread wait until these thread end
        }
        System.out.println(i);
        long end = System.currentTimeMillis();
        long time = end - start;
        System.out.println("è€—æ—¶:" + time);
    }
}

public class AccountingVol implements Runnable {
    static AccountingVol instance = new AccountingVol();
    static volatile int i = 0;

    /**
    // thread å†è¿›å…¥è¿™ä¸ªå®ä¾‹æ–¹æ³•å‰, éœ€è¦è·å–å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹çš„é”, ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯ instance å¯¹è±¡

    public void run() {

            increase();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(instance);
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(instance);

        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();

        thread1.join();
        thread2.join();

        System.out.println(i);
    }

9.3. å¹¶å‘ä¸‹çš„Hashmapâ€‹

public class HashMapMultiThread {
    static Map<String, String> map = new HashMap<String, String>();

    public static class AddThread implements Runnable {

        int start = 0;

        public AddThread(int start) {
            this.start = start;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            for (int i = start; i < 100000; i += 2) {
                map.put(Integer.toString(i), Integer.toBinaryString(i));
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     *  HashMapæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨çš„å®¹å™¨,å¤šçº¿ç¨‹æ“ä½œæ—¶ä¼šå‡ºç°å†²çª
     *
     *  jdk7ä¸‹,å¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¼è‡´ç”µè„‘æ­»æœº,jdk8ä¸­é—®é¢˜å·²ä¿®å¤
     *
     * cpuä½¿ç”¨ç‡100%, æ­»å¾ªç¯
     *
     * ç”±äºå¤šçº¿ç¨‹å†²çª, hashmap.put() æ—¶ï¼Œ å†…éƒ¨çš„é“¾è¡¨æˆç¯äº†, ä¸€è¿­ä»£å°±æˆäº†æ­»å¾ªç¯
     * @param args
     * @throws InterruptedException
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(new HashMapMultiThread.AddThread(0));
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(new HashMapMultiThread.AddThread(1));
        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();
        thread1.join();
        thread2.join();
        System.out.println(map.size());
    }
}

public class BadLockOnInteger implements Runnable {

    public static Integer i = 0;
    static BadLockOnInteger instance = new BadLockOnInteger();

    @Override
    public void run() {
        for (int j = 0; j < 1000000; j++) {
            synchronized (i) {// è¿™é‡ŒåŒæ­¥çš„å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡,
                            //æ­£ç¡®åšæ³•åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ synchronized (instance)
                i++;// å®é™…æ‰§è¡Œ i=Integer.valueOf(i.intValue() + 1) // å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å¯¹è±¡ i' , 
                      // 2ä¸ªthread ä¸ä¸€å®šèƒ½å¤Ÿçœ‹åˆ°åŒä¸€ä¸ª i, å› ä¸º i æŒ‡å‘çš„å¯¹è±¡ä¸€ç›´åœ¨å˜åŒ–, 2ä¸ªthreadæ¯æ¬¡åŠ é”éƒ½åŠ åœ¨äº†ä¸åŒçš„ i å¯¹è±¡ä¸Šäº†
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å¾—åˆ°çš„ç»“æœå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯2000000,åœ¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹çš„æ“ä½œä¸­å‡ºç°äº†é”™è¯¯
     *
     * @param args
     * @throws InterruptedException
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(instance);
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(instance);
        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();
        thread1.join();
        thread2.join();
        System.out.println(i);
    }
}

10.1.1. é‡å…¥é”-é”çš„å…¬å¹³æ€§â€‹

  • é‡å…¥é”å¯ä»¥æ›¿ä»£ synchronized

  • å€ŸåŠ© java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock å®ç°

  • æä¾›æ–°ç‰¹æ€§ - å¯¹äº å¤„ç†æ­»é”, çº¿ç¨‹é¥¥é¥¿ æœ‰å¥‡æ•ˆ

    • "ä¸­æ–­å“åº”": ä½¿ç”¨synchronized åŠ é”, å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªthreadåœ¨ç­‰å¾…, é‚£ä¹ˆç»“æœåªæœ‰2ä¸ª, è¦ä¹ˆä¸€ç›´ç­‰å¾…, è¦ä¹ˆè·å–é”æ‰§è¡Œåé¡ºåˆ©æ‰§è¡Œ. é‡å…¥é”æä¾›äº†ç¬¬ä¸‰ç§è¡Œä¸º: è¿™ä¸ªthreadå¯ä»¥ä¸­æ–­, å–æ¶ˆå¯¹é”çš„è¯·æ±‚

    • "é”ç”³è¯·ç­‰å¾…é™æ—¶": thread ç­‰å¾…å¦ä¸€ä¸ª threadé‡Šæ”¾é”, è¶…è¿‡ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´, é‚£ä¹ˆæ”¾å¼ƒè·å–é”

    • "å…¬å¹³é”": é€šè¿‡ synchronized äº§ç”Ÿçš„é”, æ˜¯ä¸å…¬å¹³é”, public ReentrantLock(boolean fair) å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®é‡å…¥é”æ˜¯å¦å…¬å¹³, é»˜è®¤æ˜¯ false;

public class ReenterLock implements Runnable {
    public static ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
    public static int i = 0;

    /**
    æ‰‹åŠ¨æŒ‡å®šä½•æ—¶è¿›å…¥é€€å‡ºé”
    */
    @Override
    public void run() {
        for (int j = 0; j < 1000000; j++) {
            lock.lock();// è¿›å…¥, è·å¾—é”, å¦‚æœé”è¢«å ç”¨, ç­‰å¾…
            // lock.lock() // å¯å¤šæ¬¡è¿›å…¥ - æ‰€ä»¥è°“ä¹‹ "é‡å…¥é”"
            try {
                i++;
            } finally {
                lock.unlock();// é€€å‡º, é‡Šæ”¾é”
                // lock.unlock() // è¿›å…¥å‡ æ¬¡, å¿…é¡»é€€å‡ºå‡ æ¬¡, å¦‚æœé€€å‡ºæ¬¡æ•°æ¯”è¿›å…¥æ¬¡æ•°å¤š, 
                                // åˆ™æŠ›å¼‚å¸¸, åä¹‹å¦‚æœå°‘, åˆ™thread ä»ç„¶æŒæœ‰é”
            }

        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        ReenterLock reenterLock = new ReenterLock();
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(reenterLock);
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(reenterLock);

        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();

        thread1.join();
        thread2.join();

        System.out.println(i);
    }

}

public class IntLock implements Runnable {
    public static ReentrantLock lock1 = new ReentrantLock();
    public static ReentrantLock lock2 = new ReentrantLock();

    int lock; // æ§åˆ¶é”ç”³è¯·é¡ºåº, æ„é€ æ­»é”

    public IntLock(int lock) {
        this.lock = lock;
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        try {
            if (lock == 1) {
                lock1.lockInterruptibly();// è·å–é”, ä½†ä¼˜å…ˆå“åº”ä¸­æ–­ 
                                    // è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼è·å¾—çš„é‡å…¥é”ä½¿å¾— thread åœ¨ç­‰å¾…è·å–é”çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­, å¯å¯¹ä¸­æ–­è¿›è¡Œå“åº”
                Thread.sleep(500);
                lock2.lockInterruptibly();
            } else {
                lock2.lockInterruptibly();
                Thread.sleep(500);
                lock1.lockInterruptibly();
            }
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (lock1.isHeldByCurrentThread()) {
                lock1.unlock();
            }
            if (lock2.isHeldByCurrentThread()) {
                lock2.unlock();
            }
            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getId() + "çº¿ç¨‹é€€å‡º");
        }

    }

    /**
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        IntLock r1 = new IntLock(1);
        IntLock r2 = new IntLock(2);

        Thread thread1 = new Thread(r1);
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(r2);

        // æ­»é”
        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();

        Thread.sleep(1000);// main thread ä¼‘çœ 

        thread2.interrupt(); // thread2ä¸­æ–­, thread2ä¼šæ”¾å¼ƒå¯¹ lock1 çš„ç”³è¯·, åŒæ—¶é‡Šæ”¾ lock2, é‚£ä¹ˆ thread1å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°lock2, å¾—ä»¥é¡ºåˆ©æ‰§è¡Œ
                            // æœ€ç»ˆ ä¸¤ä¸ª thread åŒåŒé¡ºåˆ©é€€å‡º

    }
}

public class TimeLock implements Runnable {
    public static ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();

    @Override
    public void run() {
        try {
            if (lock.tryLock(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS)) { // è·å–é”, ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´ 5, å•ä½: ç§’
                                  // ä¸å¸¦å‚æ•°de lock.tryLock() å¦‚æœé”æœªè¢«å ç”¨åˆ™ç”³è¯·æˆåŠŸ, return true, 
                                  // å¦‚æœæ­£åœ¨è¢«å ç”¨, åˆ™ä¸ç­‰å¾…ç«‹å³ return false; 
                                  // å¯ä»¥å¾ªç¯ tryLock(), å¾ªç¯å°è¯•è·å–é”, è¿™æ ·ä¸ä¼šå¼•èµ·æ­»é”
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName());
                System.out.println("get lock success");
                Thread.sleep(6000);
            } else {
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName());
                System.out.println("get lock failed");
            }
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (lock.isHeldByCurrentThread()) {
                lock.unlock();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        TimeLock timeLock = new TimeLock();
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(timeLock);
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(timeLock);

        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();
    }
}

///////////////////// å¾ªç¯ tryLock() ////////////////////////////////

public class TryLock implements Runnable {
    public static ReentrantLock lock1 = new ReentrantLock();
    public static ReentrantLock lock2 = new ReentrantLock();
    int lock;

    public TryLock(int lock) {
        this.lock = lock;
    }

    @Override
    public void run() {
        if (lock == 1) {
            while (true) {
                if (lock1.tryLock()) {
                    try {
                        try {
                            Thread.sleep(500);
                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();
                        }
                        if (lock2.tryLock()) {
                            try {
                                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getId() + ":My Job done;");
                                return;
                            } finally {
                                lock2.unlock();
                            }
                        }
                    } finally {
                        lock1.unlock();
                    }
                }
            }
        } else {
            while (true) {
                if (lock2.tryLock()) {
                    try {
                        try {
                            Thread.sleep(500);
                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                            e.printStackTrace();
                        }
                        if (lock1.tryLock()) {
                            try {
                                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getId() + ":My Job done;");
                                return;
                            } finally {
                                lock1.unlock();
                            }
                        }
                    } finally {
                        lock2.unlock();
                    }
                }
            }

        }
    }

    /**
     * ä¸Šé¢ä»£ç ä¸­é‡‡ç”¨äº†éå¸¸å®¹æ˜“æ­»é”çš„åŠ é”é¡ºåº,å¯¼è‡´thread1å’Œthread2ç”±äºé”çš„ç«äº‰è€Œäº’ç›¸ç­‰å¾…ä»è€Œå¼•èµ·æ­»é”
     *
     * ä½¿ç”¨äº†tryLockå,çº¿ç¨‹ä¸ä¼šä¸€ç›´ç­‰å¾…è€Œæ˜¯ä¸åœçš„å°è¯•å»è·å¾—é”èµ„æº,åªéœ€è¦ç­‰å¾…ä¸€å®šçš„æ—¶é—´,çº¿ç¨‹æœ€ç»ˆä¼šè·å¾—æ‰€éœ€è¦çš„èµ„æº
     *
     * @param args
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        TryLock r1 = new TryLock(1);
        TryLock r2 = new TryLock(2);
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(r1);
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(r2);

        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();
    }

}

public class FairLock implements Runnable {

    public static ReentrantLock fairLock = new ReentrantLock(true);//è®¾ç½®trueæŒ‡å®šé”æ˜¯å…¬å¹³çš„,ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸è®¾ç½®
    //public static ReentrantLock unfairLock = new ReentrantLock();

    @Override
    public void run() {
        while (true) {
            try {
                fairLock.lock();
                // unfairLock.lock();
                System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getName() + "è·å¾—é”");
            } finally {
                fairLock.unlock();
                // unfairLock.unlock();
            }
        }
    }

    /**
     * å…¬å¹³é”çš„ä¸€ä¸ªç‰¹ç‚¹æ˜¯:ä¸ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿé¥¥é¥¿ç°è±¡,åªè¦æ’é˜Ÿæœ€ç»ˆéƒ½ä¼šå¾—åˆ°èµ„æº.
     * <p/>
     * ä½†æ˜¯å®ç°å…¬å¹³é”è¦æ±‚ç³»ç»Ÿç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰åºé˜Ÿåˆ—,å› æ­¤å…¬å¹³é”çš„å®ç°æˆæœ¬è¾ƒé«˜,æ€§èƒ½ç›¸å¯¹ä½ä¸‹.
     *
     * @param args
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        FairLock r1 = new FairLock();
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(r1, "Thread_t1");
        Thread thread2 = new Thread(r1, "Thread_t2");
        Thread thread3 = new Thread(r1, "Thread_t3");

        thread1.start();
        thread2.start();
        thread3.start();
    }

}

10.1.2. Condition-é‡å…¥é”å¥½æ­æ¡£â€‹

Conditionçš„å¼ºå¤§ä¹‹å¤„åœ¨äºå®ƒå¯ä»¥ä¸ºå¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹é—´å»ºç«‹ä¸åŒçš„Conditionï¼Œ ä½¿ç”¨synchronized/wait()åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ŒnotifyAllä¼šå”¤èµ·æ‰€æœ‰é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸‹çš„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œè€Œä½¿ç”¨lock/conditionï¼Œå¯ä»¥å®ç°å¤šä¸ªé˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ŒsignalAllåªä¼šå”¤èµ·æŸä¸ªé˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸‹çš„é˜»å¡çº¿ç¨‹ (å…¸å‹ä½¿ç”¨å°±æ˜¯ å®ç°é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—, éœ€è¦ä¸¤ä¸ª condition, åˆ†åˆ«ä½œä¸º producer çš„ condition å’Œ consumer çš„ condition)

public class ReenterLockCondition implements Runnable {
    public static ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
    public static Condition condition = lock.newCondition();

    @Override
    public void run() {

        try {
            lock.lock();
            condition.await();// å½“å‰thread åœ¨ condition å¯¹è±¡ä¸Šç­‰å¾… // ç±»ä¼¼ Object.wait()
                      // å½“æ‰§è¡Œ await()æ—¶å€™, è¦æ±‚ å½“å‰thread æŒæœ‰ condition ç›¸å…³çš„é”
                      // è°ƒç”¨ await() å®Œæˆå, å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹ä¼‘çœ , ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾å½“å‰é”
            System.out.println("Thread is going on");
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            lock.unlock();
        }

    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        ReenterLockCondition reenterLockCondition = new ReenterLockCondition();
        Thread thread1 = new Thread(reenterLockCondition);
        thread1.start();
        Thread.sleep(2000);
        lock.lock(); // é¦–å…ˆè·å–conditionç›¸å…³çš„é”
        condition.signal();// å”¤é†’ condition çš„ç­‰å¾…é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­çš„ ä¸€ä¸ª thread // ç±»ä¼¼ Object.notify()
                    // ä¸€æ—¦è¢«å”¤é†’, è¿™ä¸ªthreadä¼šå°è¯•é‡æ–°è·å¾— condition ç»‘å®šçš„ é‡å…¥é”, è·å–
                    // æˆåŠŸæ‰ä¼šæ­£å¸¸ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ, å› æ­¤ è¿™é‡Œçš„ main thread éœ€è¦é‡Šæ”¾ lock, è®©æ¸¡ç»™å”¤é†’çš„thread
        lock.unlock();
    }
}

10.1.3. semaphore-ä¿¡å·é‡-å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åŒæ—¶è®¿é—®â€‹

ä¿¡å·é‡ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¯­è¨€æ— å…³çš„æ¦‚å¿µ, check here: {% post_link cs-note ğŸ“š cs-note %}#ä¿¡å·é‡

æ— è®ºæ˜¯å†…éƒ¨é”(synchronized) è¿˜æ˜¯ é‡å…¥é”(ReentrantLock) åŒä¸€æ—¶åˆ»åªå…è®¸ä¸€ä¸ª threadè®¿é—®ä¸€ä¸ªèµ„æº;

semaphore(ä¿¡å·é‡) å¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šå¤šä¸ªthread, åŒæ—¶è®¿é—®ä¸€ä¸ªèµ„æº

public class SemapDemo implements Runnable {
    final Semaphore semp = new Semaphore(5); // å£°æ˜äº†åŒ…å« 5 ä¸ª permission çš„ semaphore
                                        // å³: åŒæ—¶èƒ½ç”³è¯· 5 ä¸ªè®¸å¯; å½“æ¯ä¸ª thread æ¯æ¬¡åªç”³è¯·ä¸€ä¸ªè®¸å¯, åˆ™ è¿™ä¸ª semaphore åŒæ—¶å…è®¸ 5 ä¸ªthread è®¿é—®æŸä¸ªèµ„æº

    @Override
    public void run() {
        // åŒæ—¶å…è®¸ 5 ä¸ª thread è¿›å…¥
        try {
            semp.acquire(); // å°è¯•è·å–ä¸€ä¸ªpermission, å¦‚æœæ— æ³•è·å–, ç­‰å¾…ç›´åˆ°æœ‰å¦å¤–çš„ thread é‡Šæ”¾ permission æˆ–è€… current thread è¢« interrupt
            Thread.sleep(2000);
            System.out.println(Thread.currentThread().getId() + ":done!");
            semp.release(); // é‡Šæ”¾
                        // å¦‚æœå‘ç”Ÿä¿¡å·é‡æ³„æ¼(ç”³è¯·äº†ä½†æ²¡æœ‰é‡Šæ”¾), é‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥è¿›å…¥ä¸´ç•ŒåŒºçš„ threadå°†è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå°‘, ç›´åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰çš„threadå‡æ— æ³•è®¿é—®
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    /**
     * æ€»å…±20ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹,ç³»ç»Ÿä¼šä»¥5ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ä¸€ç»„ä¸ºå•ä½,ä¾æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œå¹¶è¾“å‡º
     *
     * @param args
     */
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(20);
        final SemapDemo demo = new SemapDemo();
        for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            executorService.submit(demo);
        }
    }
}

10.1.4. ReadWriteLock-è¯»å†™é”â€‹

  • è¯»å†™é” - å¯¹äºä¸¤ä¸ªthread, "è¯»è¯»æ“ä½œ"ä¹‹é—´çš„å…³ç³» æ˜¯ éé˜»å¡çš„, "è¯»å†™æ“ä½œ", "å†™å†™æ“ä½œ" æ˜¯é˜»å¡çš„

  • å¦‚æœç³»ç»Ÿä¸­ write æ“ä½œ << readæ“ä½œ, åˆ™è¯»å†™é”å¯ä»¥å‘æŒ¥æœ€å¤§åŠŸæ•ˆ

public class ReadWriteLockDemo {
    private static Lock lock = new ReentrantLock(); // æ™®é€šé‡å…¥é”

    private static ReentrantReadWriteLock reentrantReadWriteLock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();// è¯»å†™é”
    private static Lock readLock = reentrantReadWriteLock.readLock();
    private static Lock writeLock = reentrantReadWriteLock.writeLock();
    
    private int value;

    public Object handleRead(Lock lock) throws InterruptedException {
        try {
            lock.lock();
            Thread.sleep(1000);//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè¯»æ“ä½œçš„è€—æ—¶
            System.out.println("è¯»æ“ä½œ:" + value);
            return value;
        } finally {
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }

    public void handleWrite(Lock lock, int index) throws InterruptedException {
        try {
            lock.lock();
            Thread.sleep(1000);//æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå†™æ“ä½œçš„è€—æ—¶
            System.out.println("å†™æ“ä½œ:" + value);
            value = index;
        } finally {
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) {
        final ReadWriteLockDemo demo = new ReadWriteLockDemo();

        Runnable readRunnable = new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                //åˆ†åˆ«ä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤ç§é”æ¥è¿è¡Œ,æ€§èƒ½å·®åˆ«å¾ˆç›´è§‚çš„å°±ä½“ç°å‡ºæ¥,
                // ä½¿ç”¨è¯»å†™é”åè¯»æ“ä½œå¯ä»¥å¹¶è¡Œ,èŠ‚çœäº†å¤§é‡æ—¶é—´
                try {
                    demo.handleRead(readLock);
                    //demo.handleRead(lock);
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }

            }
        };

        Runnable writeRunnable = new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                //åˆ†åˆ«ä½¿ç”¨ä¸¤ç§é”æ¥è¿è¡Œ,æ€§èƒ½å·®åˆ«å¾ˆç›´è§‚çš„å°±ä½“ç°å‡ºæ¥
                try {
                    demo.handleWrite(writeLock, new Random().nextInt(100));
                    //demo.handleWrite(lock, new Random().nextInt(100));
                } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }

            }
        };
        for (int i = 0; i < 18; i++) {
            new Thread(readRunnable).start();// å¼€å¯ 18 ä¸ª read thread
                              // read thread ä¼š å®Œå…¨å¹¶è¡Œ, è¿™é‡Œè€—æ—¶å¯å¿½ç•¥ä¸è®¡
        }
        for (int i = 18; i < 20; i++) {
            new Thread(writeRunnable).start();// å¼€å¯ 2 ä¸ª write thread
                                            // ä¸»è¦æ˜¯å†™æ“ä½œè€—æ—¶, æ•´ä¸ªç¨‹åºè€—æ—¶ 2 s
        }
    }
}

10.1.5. CountDownLatch-å€’è®¡æ—¶å™¨â€‹

æ„ä¸º "å€’è®¡æ—¶æ …æ "

ä½¿å¾—æŸä¸ª thread åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œä¸­ç¢°åˆ° countdownlatch.wait(), åˆ™ç­‰å¾…, ç­‰åˆ°å€’è®¡æ—¶ç»“æŸ(å³è®¡æ•°é‡å½’é›¶)æ‰å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œ;

public class CountDownLatchDemo implements Runnable {
    static final CountDownLatch end = new CountDownLatch(10);// åˆ›å»ºå€’è®¡æ—¶å™¨å®ä¾‹ è®¡æ•°é‡ä¸º10
                                        // è¿™è¡¨ç¤ºéœ€è¦æœ‰ 10 ä¸ª thread å®Œæˆä»»åŠ¡, è¢« endå€’è®¡æ—¶å™¨ è®¾ç½®ä¸ºç­‰å¾… çš„ threadæ‰èƒ½å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œ
    static final CountDownLatchDemo demo = new CountDownLatchDemo();

    @Override
    public void run() {

        try {
            Thread.sleep(new Random().nextInt(3) * 1000);// æ¨¡æ‹Ÿæ£€æŸ¥ä»»åŠ¡è€—æ—¶
            System.out.println("check complete");
            end.countDown(); // é€šçŸ¥ end, æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª thread å®Œæˆäº†ä»»åŠ¡, è®¡æ•°é‡å¯ä»¥ -1 äº†
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(10);
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            executorService.submit(demo);
        }
        end.await();// ä½¿å¾— main thread ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰çš„ 10 ä¸ª thread å®Œæˆ æ‰å¼€å§‹ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ
        System.out.println("Fire!");// å‘å°„ç«ç®­
        executorService.shutdown();
    }
}

10.1.6. CyclicBarrier-å¾ªç¯æ …æ â€‹

æ¯è°ƒç”¨ä¸€æ¬¡ cyclicBarrier.await() å°±è¿›å…¥æ–°çš„è®¡é‡å¾ªç¯(è¿›å…¥æ–°ä¸€è½®ç­‰å¾…)

å¯ä»¥è®©ä¸€ç»„çº¿ç¨‹è¾¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå±éšœæ—¶è¢«é˜»å¡ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹è¾¾åˆ°å±éšœæ—¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¢«é˜»å¡çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ‰èƒ½ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ

å¦‚æœéœ€è¦å¯é‡ç”¨çš„ CountDownLatchï¼Œè€ƒè™‘ä½¿ç”¨ CyclicBarrierã€‚

public class CyclicBarrierDemo {
    public static class Soldier implements Runnable {
        private String soldier;
        private final CyclicBarrier cyclicBarrier;

        public Soldier(CyclicBarrier cyclicBarrier, String soldier) {
            this.soldier = soldier;
            this.cyclicBarrier = cyclicBarrier;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            try {
                cyclicBarrier.await();// ç­‰å¾…, å¼€å§‹ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è®¡é‡, ç›´åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰çš„ Soldier çº¿ç¨‹ å¯åŠ¨å®Œæ¯•, æ‰å¼€å§‹ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ
                doWork();
                cyclicBarrier.await();// å†æ¬¡ç­‰å¾…, å¼€å§‹ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡è®¡é‡
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }

        }

        void doWork() {
            try {
                Thread.sleep(Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 10000));
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            System.out.println(soldier + ":ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ");
        }
    }

    public static class BarrierRun implements Runnable {

        boolean flag;
        int N;

        public BarrierRun(boolean flag, int N) {
            this.flag = flag;
            this.N = N;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            if (flag) {// ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡è®¡é‡,è¿›å…¥è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†æ”¯
                System.out.println("å¸ä»¤:[å£«å…µ" + N + "ä¸ª,ä»»åŠ¡å®Œæˆ!");
            } else {
                System.out.println("å¸ä»¤:[å£«å…µ" + N + "ä¸ª,é›†åˆå®Œæ¯•!");// ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è®¡é‡, è¿›å…¥è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†æ”¯
                flag = true;
            }
        }
    }


    public static void main(String args[]) {
        final int N = 10;// è®¡æ•°é‡
        Thread[] allSoldier = new Thread[N];
        boolean flag = false;
        CyclicBarrier cyclicBarrier = new CyclicBarrier(N, new BarrierRun(flag, N));// barrierå®ä¾‹, è®¡æ•°é‡è¾¾åˆ°æŒ‡æ ‡æ—¶å€™åˆ™æ‰§è¡Œ BarrierRun çº¿ç¨‹
        System.out.println("é›†åˆé˜Ÿä¼!");
        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
            System.out.println("å£«å…µ" + i + "æŠ¥é“!");
            allSoldier[i] = new Thread(new Soldier(cyclicBarrier, "å£«å…µ" + i));
            allSoldier[i].start();// å¯åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ª soldier çº¿ç¨‹
                          // å½“ç¬¬åä¸ªå¯åŠ¨å®Œæ¯•, ä¸€æ¬¡ è®¡æ•°é‡ å®Œæˆ, æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ BarrierRun çº¿ç¨‹, è®¡æ•°é‡
                          // æ¢å¤ 10, è¿›è¡Œç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡ è®¡é‡
        }
    }
}

10.1.7. LockSupport-çº¿ç¨‹é˜»å¡å·¥å…·ç±»â€‹

ä½¿å¾—threadé˜»å¡

å’Œ Thread.suspend() ç›¸æ¯”æ›´å¥½, å› ä¸ºä½¿ç”¨suspend()ä¼šæŒ‚èµ·thread, é”ä¸ä¼šé‡Šæ”¾, è€Œä¸”ç”±äºæŒ‡ä»¤é‡æ’, resume()åœ¨suspend()å‰æ‰§è¡Œä¼šé€ æˆthreadæ°¸è¿œæŒ‚èµ·

public class LockSupportDemo {
    public static Object u = new Object();
    static ChangeObjectThread t1 = new ChangeObjectThread("t1");
    static ChangeObjectThread t2 = new ChangeObjectThread("t2");

    public static class ChangeObjectThread extends Thread {
        public ChangeObjectThread(String name) {
            super.setName(name);
        }

        public void run() {
            synchronized (u) {
                System.out.println("in " + getName());
                LockSupport.park();
            }
        }
    }


    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        t1.start();
        Thread.sleep(100);
        t2.start();
        LockSupport.unpark(t1);
        LockSupport.unpark(t2);
        t1.join();
        t2.join();
    }
}

public class ThreadPoolDemo {
    public static class MyTask implements Runnable {

        @Override
        public void run() {
            System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + "Thread ID:" + Thread.currentThread().getId());

            try {
                Thread.sleep(1000);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) {
        MyTask myTask = new MyTask();
        int poolSize = Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors();// è·å–CPUæ ¸å¿ƒ,
        System.out.println("poolSize=" + poolSize);
        ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(poolSize);
        for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            executorService.submit(myTask);
        }
    }
}

public class ExtThreadPool {

    public static class MyTask implements Runnable {
        public String name;

        public MyTask(String name) {
            this.name = name;
        }

        @Override
        public void run() {
            System.out.println("æ­£åœ¨æ‰§è¡Œ:Thread ID:" + Thread.currentThread().getId() + ",Task Name:" + name);

            try {
                Thread.sleep(100);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }


    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        ExecutorService executorService = new ThreadPoolExecutor(5, 5, 0L, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, new LinkedBlockingDeque<Runnable>()) {
            protected void beforeExecute(Thread t, Runnable r) {
                System.out.println("å‡†å¤‡æ‰§è¡Œ:" + ((MyTask) r).name);
            }

            protected void afterExecute(Thread t, Runnable r) {
                System.out.println("æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆ:" + ((MyTask) r).name);
            }

            protected void terminated() {
                System.out.println("çº¿ç¨‹æ± é€€å‡º!");
            }
        };

        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            MyTask task = new MyTask("TASK-GEYM-" + i);
            executorService.execute(task);// å¦ä¸€ç§ä¸åŒäº submit() çš„æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡æ–¹å¼
            Thread.sleep(10);
        }
        executorService.shutdown();// æ¸©å’Œçš„å…³é—­
    }
}

public class RejectThreadPoolDemo {
    public static class MyTask implements Runnable {

        @Override
        public void run() {
            System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() + ":Thread ID:" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
            try {
                Thread.sleep(100);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }


    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        MyTask myTask = new MyTask();

        ExecutorService executorService = new ThreadPoolExecutor(
                 5, 5,                          // 5å¸¸é©»çº¿ç¨‹, 5æœ€å¤§çº¿ç¨‹ , ç­‰ä»·äºå›ºå®šå¤§å°çº¿ç¨‹æ± 
                 0L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, 
                 new LinkedBlockingDeque<Runnable>(10),// å®¹é‡10
                  Executors.defaultThreadFactory()
                , new RejectedExecutionHandler() { // è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç­–ç•¥
            @Override
            public void rejectedExecution(Runnable r, ThreadPoolExecutor executor) {
                System.out.println(r.toString() + " is discard");
            }
        });

        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
            executorService.submit(myTask);
            Thread.sleep(10);
        }
    }
}

10.2.2.4. è‡ªå®šä¹‰çº¿ç¨‹æ± åç§°â€‹

// å‘½åçº¿ç¨‹å·¥å‚
    static class NamedThreadFactory implements ThreadFactory {
        private static final AtomicInteger poolNumber = new AtomicInteger(1);
        private final ThreadGroup group;
        private final AtomicInteger threadNumber = new AtomicInteger(1);
        private final String namePrefix;

        NamedThreadFactory(String name) {

            SecurityManager s = System.getSecurityManager();
            group = (s != null) ? s.getThreadGroup() : Thread.currentThread().getThreadGroup();
            if (null == name || name.isEmpty()) {
                name = "pool";
            }

            namePrefix = name + "-" + poolNumber.getAndIncrement() + "-thread-";
        }

        public Thread newThread(Runnable r) {
            Thread t = new Thread(group, r, namePrefix + threadNumber.getAndIncrement(), 0);
            if (t.isDaemon())
                t.setDaemon(false);
            if (t.getPriority() != Thread.NORM_PRIORITY)
                t.setPriority(Thread.NORM_PRIORITY);
            return t;
        }
    }
// ä½¿ç”¨:

ThreadPoolExecutor executorOne = new ThreadPoolExecutor(5, 5, 1, TimeUnit.MINUTES,
            new LinkedBlockingQueue<>(), new NamedThreadFactory("ASYN-ACCEPT-POOL"));

æ›´å¥½çš„æ”¹è¿›æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ç›´æ¥æ‹“å±• çº¿ç¨‹æ± 

public class TraceThreadPoolExecutor extends ThreadPoolExecutor {
    
    public TraceThreadPoolExecutor(int corePoolSize, int maximumPoolSize, long keepAliveTime, TimeUnit unit, BlockingQueue<Runnable> workQueue) {
        super(corePoolSize, maximumPoolSize, keepAliveTime, unit, workQueue);
    }

    // ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è¦†ç›– submitæ–¹æ³•
    public void execute(Runnable task) {
        super.execute(wrap(task, clientTrace(), Thread.currentThread().getName()));
    }

    private Runnable wrap(final Runnable task, final Exception clientTrace, String name) {
        return new Runnable() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                try {
                    task.run();
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    clientTrace.printStackTrace();
                    throw e;
                }
            }
        };
    }

    private Exception clientTrace() {
        return new Exception("Client stack trace");// ä¿å­˜ç€æäº¤ä»»åŠ¡çš„çº¿ç¨‹çš„å †æ ˆä¿¡æ¯
    }
}

// æµ‹è¯•
public class TraceDivTaskDemo {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        ThreadPoolExecutor threadPoolExecutor = new TraceThreadPoolExecutor(0, Integer.MAX_VALUE, 0L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, new SynchronousQueue<Runnable>());
        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
            threadPoolExecutor.execute(new NoTraceDivTaskDemo.DivTask(100, i));
        }
    }
}

10.2.5. Fork-Joinæ¡†æ¶â€‹

ç±»ä¼¼ MapReduce

jdkæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ª ForkJoinPool çº¿ç¨‹æ± , å¯¹äº fork() å¹¶ä¸æ€¥äºåˆ†å‰å‡ºæ–°çš„ çº¿ç¨‹, è€Œæ˜¯å°†æ–°ä»»åŠ¡æäº¤ç»™ ForkJoinPool ; è¿™æ ·, æäº¤çš„ä»»åŠ¡æ•°å¯èƒ½è¿œè¿œå¤§äºå®é™…çº¿ç¨‹æ•°, æ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹æ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ—å®¹çº³ä»»åŠ¡, æ¯æ¬¡ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—å¤´éƒ¨è·å–ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œ, å¦‚æœè¿™ä¸ª çº¿ç¨‹å°†é˜Ÿåˆ—ä»»åŠ¡å…¨éƒ¨å®Œæˆ, ä¼šå»å¸®åŠ©å…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹ ---- ä»å…¶ä»– thread çš„ä»»åŠ¡é˜Ÿåˆ—å°¾éƒ¨è·å–ä»»åŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œ

ForkJoinPool æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³• submit, æäº¤ ForkJoinTask ä»»åŠ¡(è¿™ç§ä»»åŠ¡æ”¯æŒ form()åˆ†è§£å’Œ join()ç­‰å¾…), å®ƒåŒ…å«2ä¸ªå­ç±» RecursiveAction (æ— è¿”å›å€¼ä»»åŠ¡) å’Œ RecursiveTask (æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ä»»åŠ¡)

public class CountTask extends RecursiveTask {
    private static final int THRESHOLD = 10000;// è¶…è¿‡è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†ç•Œç‚¹, å°±ä½¿ç”¨ ä»»åŠ¡åˆ†è§£

    private long start;
    private long end;

    public CountTask(long start, long end) {
        this.start = start;
        this.end = end;
    }


    @Override
    protected Long compute() {
        long sum = 0;
        boolean canCompute = (end - start) < THRESHOLD;
        if (canCompute) {
            for (long i = start; i <= end; i++) {
                sum += i;
            }
        } else {
            long step = (start + end) / 100;

            ArrayList<CountTask> subTasks = new ArrayList<CountTask>();
            long pos = start;

            for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
                long lastOne = pos + step;
                if (lastOne > end) {
                    lastOne = end;
                }
                CountTask subTask = new CountTask(pos, lastOne);
                pos += step + 1;
                subTasks.add(subTask);
                subTask.fork();// æäº¤å­ä»»åŠ¡, ç±»ä¼¼é€’å½’è°ƒç”¨, è‹¥è°ƒç”¨å±‚æ¬¡å¤ªæ·±, å¯èƒ½ä¼šæ ˆæº¢å‡º
            }

            for (CountTask t : subTasks) {
                sum += (Long) t.join();// ç­‰å¾…æ‰€æœ‰å­ä»»åŠ¡ç»“æŸ, æ±‚å’Œ
            }
        }


        return sum;
    }


    public static void main(String args[]) {
        ForkJoinPool forkJoinPool = new ForkJoinPool();
        CountTask task = new CountTask(0, 200000L);
        ForkJoinTask<Long> result = forkJoinPool.submit(task);

        long res = 0;
        try {
            res = result.get();
            System.out.println("sum=" + res);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (ExecutionException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

12.3.2. threadLocal ç¤ºä¾‹â€‹

/**
 * ThreadLocal  
 *
 * @version 0.1
 * @author xy
 * @date 2017å¹´9æœˆ2æ—¥ ä¸‹åˆ5:15:54

ç»“æœ:
init value: false
thread1 value: true
thread2 value: null

@Data
public class Client {
    
    private ThreadLocal<Boolean> threadLocal = new ThreadLocal<Boolean>();
    
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Client client = new Client();
        final ThreadLocal<Boolean> threadLocal = client.getThreadLocal();
        threadLocal.set(false);
        
        System.out.println("init value: " + threadLocal.get());
        
        new Thread(new Runnable() {
            
            public void run() {
                threadLocal.set(true);
                System.out.println("thread1 value: " + threadLocal.get());
            }
        }).start();;
        
        new Thread(new Runnable() {
            
            public void run() {
                System.out.println("thread2 value: " + threadLocal.get());
            }
        }).start();;
    }
}

  • ä¸€ä¸ª Thread ä¸­å­˜åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ª ThreadLocalMap fieldï¼ŒThreadLocalMapä¸­çš„ key æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Weakreferenceï¼Œ æŒ‡å‘ThreadLocalï¼Œvalueä»£è¡¨é€šè¿‡Thread Localå­˜å‚¨çš„å˜é‡ã€‚

  • ThreadLocalMap å¯ä»¥å­˜å‚¨å¤šä¸ª key(å³ThreadLocal)ï¼Œ ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´åŒä¸€ä¸ª Thread å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®å¤šä¸ª â€œæœ¬åœ°çº¿ç¨‹å˜é‡â€

  • ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸åŒçš„çº¿ç¨‹è®¿é—®åŒä¸€ä¸ªThreadLocalï¼Œå¾—åˆ°çš„ç¡®æ˜¯ä¸åŒçš„æ•°å€¼, å› ä¸ºä¸åŒçš„threadå†…éƒ¨ç»´æŠ¤äº†ä¸åŒçš„threadLocalMap; "æœ¬åœ°çº¿ç¨‹å˜é‡" å®é™…ä¸Šè¿˜æ˜¯ä¿å­˜åœ¨ Thread è‡ªèº«å†…éƒ¨

     // å°†æŒ‡å®šçš„å€¼è®¾ç½®è¿›å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹çš„threadLocalä¸­
    public void set(T value) {
        Thread t = Thread.currentThread();
        // æ ¹æ®å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹è·å– ThreadLocalMap, å¯
        //ä»¥çŒœæµ‹ ThreadLocalMapå¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­˜å‚¨é”®å€¼å¯¹çš„å®¹å™¨

        ThreadLocalMap map = getMap(t);
        if (map != null)
            // å¦‚æœè·å–åˆ°äº†, è®¾ç½®ä¸€ä¸ªé”®å€¼å¯¹, key ä¸ºå½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹æ‰€è®¿é—®çš„ ThreadLocal,
            // value ä¸º å­˜å‚¨çš„å€¼. ä»è¿™é‡Œè¿›å…¥, çœ‹çœ‹ThreadLocalMap#set çš„å®ç°, è§ ç‰‡æ®µ3; 
            map.set(this, value);
        else 
            // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰è·å–åˆ°map, åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€ä¸ª: æ ¹æ® å½“å‰
            //çº¿ç¨‹ (ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°)è·å–åˆ°çº¿ç¨‹å†…éƒ¨çš„threadLocalMap, å°†é”®å€¼å¯¹[threadLocal, value] å­˜å…¥
            createMap(t, value);
    }

ç‰‡æ®µ2: ThreadLocalMapçš„ç±»ç»“æ„

static class ThreadLocalMap {
        // Entryç±»ç»§æ‰¿äº†WeakReference<ThreadLocal<?>>ï¼Œå³æ¯ä¸ªEntryå¯¹è±¡éƒ½
        //æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªThreadLocalçš„å¼±å¼•ç”¨ä½œä¸ºkeyï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†é˜²æ­¢å†…å­˜æ³„éœ²ã€‚ä¸€æ—¦
        //çº¿ç¨‹ç»“æŸï¼Œå¤–éƒ¨çš„ threadLocal å¼•ç”¨è¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸º null , åˆ™
        // è¿™é‡Œçš„key çœ‹ä¼¼ä»æ—§æŒ‡å‘ ThreadLocal å¯¹è±¡, å®é™…ä¸Šè¿™ä¸ªæŒ‡å‘æ— 
        //æ•ˆ, ThreadLocalç›´æ¥å˜ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸å¯è¾¾çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªEntryå°±å¯ä»¥è¢«å›æ”¶äº†ã€‚
        static class Entry extends WeakReference<ThreadLocal<?>> {
            /** The value associated with this ThreadLocal. */
            Object value;
            Entry(ThreadLocal<?> k, Object v) {
                super(k);// å°† k ä½œä¸º "å¼±å¼•ç”¨"
                value = v;
            }
        }
        // ThreadLocalMap çš„åˆå§‹å®¹é‡ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ä¸º2çš„å€æ•°
        private static final int INITIAL_CAPACITY = 16;

        // resizedæ—¶å€™éœ€è¦çš„table
        private Entry[] table;

        // tableä¸­çš„entryä¸ªæ•°
        private int size = 0;

        // æ‰©å®¹æ•°å€¼
        private int threshold; // Default to 0

         /**
         * Construct a new map initially containing (firstKey, firstValue).
         * ThreadLocalMaps are constructed lazily, so we only create
         * one when we have at least one entry to put in it.
         æ„é€ å‡½æ•°, 
         */
        ThreadLocalMap(ThreadLocal<?> firstKey, Object firstValue) {
            // åˆå§‹å®¹é‡ä¸º16çš„entry
            table = new Entry[INITIAL_CAPACITY];
            // è®¡ç®— firstKey çš„hashcode
            int i = firstKey.threadLocalHashCode & (INITIAL_CAPACITY - 1);
            // å­˜å‚¨åˆ° table ä¸­
            table[i] = new Entry(firstKey, firstValue);
            size = 1;
            setThreshold(INITIAL_CAPACITY);
        }

ç‰‡æ®µ3: ThreadLocalMap#set çš„å®ç°

private void set(ThreadLocal<?> key, Object value) {
    Entry[] tab = table;
    int len = tab.length;
    int i = key.threadLocalHashCode & (len-1);

    // éå† table, ä¸ºtable ä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸ªåŒ¹é…ä¸Škey(threadLocal) çš„entryè®¾ç½®value
    for (Entry e = tab[i];
            e != null;
            e = tab[i = nextIndex(i, len)]) {
        ThreadLocal<?> k = e.get();

        if (k == key) {
            e.value = value;
            return;
        }

        if (k == null) {
            replaceStaleEntry(key, value, i);
            return;
        }
    }

    tab[i] = new Entry(key, value);
    int sz = ++size;
    if (!cleanSomeSlots(i, sz) && sz >= threshold) // cleanSomeSlotsçš„ä½œç”¨ä¸»è¦æ˜¯æ¸…ç†æ— ç”¨çš„entry
        rehash();
}

// å¦‚æœEntryåœ¨å­˜æ”¾è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­å†²çªäº†ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨nextIndexæ¥å¤„ç†ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤ºã€‚hashmapä¸­å¯¹å†²çªçš„å¤„ç†
private static int nextIndex(int i, int len) {
    return ((i + 1 < len) ? i + 1 : 0);
}

çœ‹çœ‹ ThreadLocal#get çš„å®ç°

code4

public T get() {
    Thread t = Thread.currentThread();
    // è·å– threadå¯¹åº”çš„ThreadLocalMap
    ThreadLocalMap map = getMap(t);
    if (map != null) {
        ThreadLocalMap.Entry e = map.getEntry(this);
        if (e != null) {
            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
            T result = (T)e.value;
            return result;
        }
    }
    return setInitialValue(); // å¦‚æœmap ä¸ºnull, è·Ÿè¿›çœ‹çœ‹, è§code5
}

code5

private T setInitialValue() {
    T value = initialValue(); 
    Thread t = Thread.currentThread();
    ThreadLocalMap map = getMap(t);
    if (map != null)
        map.set(this, value);
    else
        createMap(t, value);
    return value; //  è¿”å›å€¼è§initialValue()
    }

protected T initialValue() {
        return null;// å¦‚æœä¸è®¾ç½®ThreadLocalçš„æ•°å€¼ï¼Œé»˜è®¤å°±æ˜¯null
    }

public class AtomicIntegerDemo {
    static AtomicInteger i = new AtomicInteger();

    public static class AddThread implements Runnable {

        @Override
        public void run() {
            for (int j = 0; j < 10000; j++) {
                i.incrementAndGet();// ä½¿ç”¨ casæ“ä½œ å°†è‡ªå·±åŠ 1
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {

        Thread[] threads = new Thread[10];

        for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
            threads[j] = new Thread(new AddThread());
        }

        for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
            threads[j].start();
        }
        for (int j = 0; j < 10; j++) {
            threads[j].join();
        }

        System.out.println(i);// æ­£å¸¸è¾“å‡º 100000
    }
}

public class AtomicRefrenceDemo {

    public static void main(String args[]) {
        final AtomicReference<Integer> money = new AtomicReference<Integer>();
        money.set(19);

        // å¼€å¯100ä¸ªèµ é€ä»£é‡‘å·è¿›ç¨‹
        for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
            new Thread() {
                public void run() {
                    while (true) {
                        Integer m = money.get();
                        if (m < 20) { // å°äº 20 åˆ™å……å€¼
                            if (money.compareAndSet(m, m + 20)) {
                                System.out.println("ä½™é¢å°äº20å…ƒ,å……å€¼æˆåŠŸ,ä½™é¢:" + money.get() + "å…ƒ");
                                break;
                            }
                        } else {
                            System.out.println("ä½™é¢å¤§äº20,æ— éœ€å……å€¼");
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }.start();
        }
        // å¼€å¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¶ˆè´¹è¿›ç¨‹, ä½†æ˜¯å†…éƒ¨å¾ªç¯100æ¬¡
        /**
        - è€ƒè™‘è¿™ç§åœºæ™¯: è´¦æˆ·å·²ç»è¢«å……å€¼äº†ä¸€æ¬¡, è¿™æ—¶æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå……å€¼threadè®¿é—®
            äº†è´¦æˆ·, æ­£å‡†å¤‡åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥æ­£å¸¸å†™å…¥, æ¶ˆè´¹thread è¿ç»­æ¶ˆè´¹
            äº†20å…ƒ, èµ é€threadä¼šè¯¯è®¤ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªè´¦æˆ·æ²¡æœ‰è¢«èµ é€è¿‡ , ä¼šå†æ¬¡èµ é€

        - åŸå› : è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢è¢«å¤šä¸ªthreadåå¤ä¿®æ”¹, æœ€ç»ˆæ¢å¤æˆåŸæ ·, ä½¿å¾— cas æ“ä½œ
            æ— æ³•å‡†ç¡®åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥å†™å…¥; ------ AtomicStampedReference å¯ä»¥å¾ˆå¥½çš„è§£å†³
        */
        new Thread() {
            public void run() {
                for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++) {

                    while (true) {
                        Integer m = money.get();
                        if (m > 10) {
                            System.out.println("é‡‘é¢å¤§äº10å…ƒ");
                            if (money.compareAndSet(m, m - 10)) {
                                System.out.println("æˆåŠŸæ¶ˆè´¹10å…ƒ,ä½™é¢:" + money.get() + "å…ƒ");
                                break;
                            }
                        } else {
                            System.out.println("æ²¡æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿçš„é‡‘é¢");
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                    try {
                        Thread.sleep(100);
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }
            }
        }.start();
    }
}

public class AtomicStampedReferenceDemo {

    public static void main(String args[]) {

            final int timestap = money.getStamp();// è·å¾—æ—¶é—´æˆ³
            new Thread() {
                public void run() {

                            // æ¯æ¬¡å†™å…¥, æ—¶é—´æˆ³ä¹Ÿè¦ä¿®æ”¹

                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
            }.start();

        new Thread() {
            public void run() {

                        Integer m = money.getReference();

                                break;

                            break;
                        }

12.5.6. AtomicIntegerArray-æ— é”çš„æ•°ç»„â€‹

public class AtomicInterArrayDemo {
    // å£°æ˜æ•°ç»„, é•¿åº¦10
    static AtomicIntegerArray array = new AtomicIntegerArray(10);

    public static class AddThread implements Runnable {
        @Override
        public void run() {
            for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
                array.getAndIncrement(i % array.length());//æ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å„åŠ 1000æ¬¡
            }
        }
    }

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        Thread[] threads = new Thread[10];
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            threads[i] = new Thread(new AddThread());
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            threads[i].start();
        }
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            threads[i].join();
            System.out.println(array);
        }
    }
}

12.5.7. AtomicIntegerFieldUpdater-å‡çº§æ™®é€šå˜é‡æ”¯æŒåŸå­æ“ä½œâ€‹

Integer, Long, æ™®é€šå¯¹è±¡å¼•ç”¨ éƒ½æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„ updater, ç”¨æ¥æ”¯æŒ casæ“ä½œ

  • updater åªèƒ½ä¿®æ”¹è‡ªå·±å¯è§èŒƒå›´å†…çš„å˜é‡, æ¯”å¦‚ ä¸‹é¢çš„ score å¦‚æœæ—¶ private çš„, å°±ä¸è¡Œ

// æ¨¡æ‹Ÿé€‰ä¸¾
public class AtomicIntegerFieldUpdaterDemo {
    public static class Candidate {// å€™é€‰äºº
        int id;
        volatile int score;// å¹¶éçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨
    }

    // é’ˆå¯¹ Candidate ç±»çš„ score æˆå‘˜çš„  updater
    public final static AtomicIntegerFieldUpdater<Candidate> scoreUpdater = AtomicIntegerFieldUpdater.newUpdater(Candidate.class, "score");
    //
    public static AtomicInteger allScore = new AtomicInteger(0);// è¿™ä¸ªå˜é‡ç”¨æ¥éªŒè¯å®éªŒç»“æœ

    public static void main(String args[]) throws InterruptedException {
        final Candidate stu = new Candidate();
        Thread[] t = new Thread[10000];

        for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
            t[i] = new Thread() {
                public void run() {
                    if (Math.random() > 0.4) {
                        scoreUpdater.incrementAndGet(stu);
                        allScore.incrementAndGet();
                    }
                }
            };
            t[i].start();
        }

        for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
            t[i].join();
        }
        System.out.println("score=" + stu.score);
        System.out.println("allScore=" + allScore);
    }


}

/**
 * LazySingleton
 */
public class LazySingleton {

    private LazySingleton() {
        System.out.println("Singleton is create");
    }

    private static LazySingleton instance;

    public static synchronized LazySingleton getInstance() {
        if (instance == null) {
            instance = new LazySingleton();
        }
        return instance;
    }
}

æœ€å¥½çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼šæ‡’åŠ è½½ï¼Œ ä¸åŠ é”

public class Singleton {

14.2. ä¸å˜æ¨¡å¼â€‹

14.3.1. ä½¿ç”¨é˜»å¡é˜Ÿåˆ—å®ç°â€‹

/**
 * Data
 */
public class Data {

  private final int intDdata;

  public Data(int value) {
    this.intDdata = value;
  }

  /**
   * @return the intDdata
   */
  public int getIntDdata() {
    return intDdata;
  }

  @Override
  public String toString() {
    return "data:[intData=]" + this.intDdata;
  }

}

/////////////////////////////////////////////
/**
 * Consumer
 */
public class Consumer implements Runnable {

  private BlockingQueue<Data> queue;

  public Consumer(BlockingQueue<Data> queue) {
    this.queue = queue;
  }

  @Override
  public void run() {
    System.out.println("start [consumer], id=" + Thread.currentThread().getId());

    try {
      while (true) {
        if (Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
          System.out.println("stop [consumer], id=" + Thread.currentThread().getId());
          break;
        }

        Data data = queue.take();
        if (null != data) {
          int re = data.getIntDdata() * data.getIntDdata();
          Thread.sleep(new Random().nextInt(1000));// simulate the time consumption

          System.out.println(MessageFormat.format("{0} * {1} = {2}", data.getIntDdata, data.getIntDdata(), re));
        }
      }
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();// ä¸­æ–­
    }
  }
}

/////////////////////////////////////

/**
 * Producer
 */
public class Producer implements Runnable {

  private volatile boolean running = true;
  private BlockingQueue<Data> queue;
  private AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger(0);

  public Producer(BlockingQueue<Data> queue) {
    this.queue = queue;
  }

  @Override
  public void run() {
    System.out.println("start [producer], id=" + Thread.currentThread().getId());

    try {
      while (running) {
        // æ„é€ æ•°æ®
        Thread.sleep(new Random().nextInt(1000));
        Data data = new Data(count.incrementAndGet());
  
        boolean ok = queue.offer(data, 2, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
        if (!ok) {
          System.err.println("failed to put data, data: " + data);
        }
      }
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
      Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
    }

  }

  public void stop() {
    this.running = false;
  }
}

//////////////////////////////////

/**
 * Client
 */
public class Client {

  public static void main(String[] args) {
    LinkedBlockingQueue<Data> queue = new LinkedBlockingQueue<Data>();

    Consumer consumer1 = new Consumer(queue);
    Consumer consumer2 = new Consumer(queue);
    Consumer consumer3 = new Consumer(queue);

    Producer producer1 = new Producer(queue);
    Producer producer2 = new Producer(queue);
    Producer producer3 = new Producer(queue);

    ExecutorService pool = new ThreadPoolExecutor(6, 6, 0L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, Executors.defaultThreadFactory());
    pool.execute(producer1);
    pool.execute(producer2);
    pool.execute(producer3);
    pool.execute(consumer1);
    pool.execute(consumer2);
    pool.execute(consumer3);

    try {
      Thread.sleep(10*1000);
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
    }
    producer1.stop();
    producer2.stop();
    producer3.stop();

    try {
      Thread.sleep(3*1000);
    } catch (Exception e) {
      e.printStackTrace();
    }

    pool.shutdown();
  }
}

14.8.1. å…¸å‹Futureæ¨¡å¼å®ç°â€‹

æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³æ˜¯ - å¼‚æ­¥è°ƒç”¨

futureæ¨¡å¼æµç¨‹å›¾:

main() æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨è€—æ—¶çš„å­å‡½æ•°, ä¼šç«‹å³è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª "å¥‘çº¦"(ç›¸å½“äºä¼ªé€ çš„æ•°æ®), è¿™æ—¶ main() ä¼šæ¥ç€å¾€ä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œ, æœªæ¥å½“è€—æ—¶çš„å­å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œå®Œ, main()æ‰è·å¾—çœŸæ­£çš„ç»“æœ

// æ ¸å¿ƒ interface - è¡¨ç¤ºå¸Œæœ›è·å–çš„æ•°æ®
public interface Data {
    public String getResult();

}

// çœŸå®æ•°æ®
public class RealData implements Data {

    protected final String result;

    public RealData(String param) {
        //RealDataçš„æ„é€ å¾ˆæ…¢,éœ€è¦ç”¨æˆ·ç­‰å¾…å¾ˆä¹…,è¿™é‡Œç”¨sleepæ¨¡æ‹Ÿ
        StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            stringBuffer.append(param);
            try {
                Thread.sleep(100);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
        result = stringBuffer.toString();
    }

    @Override
    public String getResult() {
        return result;
    }
}

// æ ¸å¿ƒ ä¼ªé€ çš„æ•°æ® - ä¼šç«‹å³è¿”å›ç»™è°ƒç”¨è€…
public class FutureData implements Data {

    protected RealData realData = null; // çœŸå®æ•°æ®
    protected boolean isReady = false; // çœŸå®æ•°æ®æ˜¯å¦æ„é€ å®Œæ¯•

    public synchronized void setRealData(RealData realData) {
        if (isReady) {
            return;
        }
        this.realData = realData;
        isReady = true;
        notifyAll(); // å”¤é†’æ‰€æœ‰ç­‰å¾…çš„ thread
    }


    @Override
    public synchronized String getResult() {
        while (!isReady) {
            try {
                wait(); // å¦‚æœ realData è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰æ„é€ å¥½, çº¿ç¨‹ç­‰å¾…
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }

        return realData.result;
    }
}

// å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
public class Client {
    public Data request(final String queryStr) {
        final FutureData futureData = new FutureData();
        
        new Thread() {
            public void run() {//RealDataçš„æ„é€ å¾ˆæ…¢,æ‰€ä»¥åœ¨å•ç‹¬çš„çº¿ç¨‹ä¸­è¿è¡Œ
                RealData realData = new RealData(queryStr);
                futureData.setRealData(realData);
            }
        }.start();

        return futureData; // ç›´æ¥è¿”å›åŒ…è£…æ•°æ®
    }
}

// æµ‹è¯•
public class Main {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        Client client = new Client();
        //è¿™é‡Œä¼šç«‹å³è¿”å›,å› ä¸ºå¾—åˆ°çš„æ˜¯FutureDataè€Œä¸æ˜¯RealData
        Data data = client.request("name");
        System.out.println("è¯·æ±‚å®Œæ¯•");

        try {

            //è¿™é‡Œç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªsleepä»£æ›¿äº†å¯¹å…¶ä»–ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘çš„å¤„ç†
            //åœ¨å¤„ç†è¿™äº›ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­,RealDataè¢«åˆ›å»º,ä»è€Œå……åˆ†åˆ©ç”¨äº†ç­‰å¾…æ—¶é—´
            Thread.sleep(2000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        //ä½¿ç”¨çœŸå®çš„æ•°æ®
        System.out.println("æ•°æ®=" + data.getResult());

14.8.2. jdkä¸­çš„futureæ¨¡å¼â€‹

// Callable æ¥å£ - æ„é€ çœŸå®æ•°æ®
public class RealData2 implements Callable<String> {
    private String data;

    public RealData2(String data) {
        this.data = data;
    }

    @Override
    public String call() throws Exception {
        StringBuffer stringBuffer = new StringBuffer();
        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
            stringBuffer.append(data);
            Thread.sleep(100);// æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè€—æ—¶æ“ä½œ
        }

        return stringBuffer.toString();
    }
}

public class FutureMain {

    public static void main(String args[]) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
        //æ„é€ FutureTask - æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼
        // new RealData2("a") å‘Šè¯‰äº† FutureTask çœŸå®æ•°æ®å¦‚ä½•äº§ç”Ÿ
        FutureTask<String> futureTask = new FutureTask<String>(new RealData2("a"));

        ExecutorService executorService = Executors.newFixedThreadPool(1);

        //æ‰§è¡ŒFutureTask,ç›¸å½“äºå‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­çš„client.request("a")å‘é€è¯·æ±‚
        //åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¼€å¯çº¿ç¨‹è¿›è¡ŒRealDataçš„call()æ‰§è¡Œ
        executorService.submit(futureTask);

        System.out.println("è¯·æ±‚å®Œæ¯•");

        try {
            //è¿™é‡Œä¾ç„¶å¯ä»¥åšé¢å¤–çš„æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ,ä½¿ç”¨sleepä»£æ›¿å…¶ä»–ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘çš„å¤„ç†
            Thread.sleep(2000);
        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }

        //ç›¸å½“äºå‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­çš„data.getResult(),å–å¾—call()æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼
        //å¦‚æœæ­¤æ—¶call()æ–¹æ³•æ²¡æœ‰æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆ,åˆ™ä¾ç„¶ä¼šç­‰å¾…
        System.out.println("æ•°æ®=" + futureTask.get());
    }
}

14.9. map-reduce æ¨¡å¼â€‹

æŠŠå·¥ä½œæ‹†åˆ†æˆå¤šä»½ï¼Œå¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å…±åŒå®Œæˆåï¼Œå†ç»„åˆç»“æœï¼ŒJava8ä¸­çš„streamä¸Fork/Joinå°±æ˜¯è¿™ç§æ¨¡å¼çš„ä½“ç°

14.11. å¹¶è¡Œæµæ°´çº¿â€‹

å¹¶å‘ç®—æ³•é€‚åˆåˆ†è§£å„ä¸ªå­è¿ç®—æ²¡æœ‰ä¾èµ–çš„è®¡ç®—æ¥åˆ©ç”¨å¤šæ ¸ä¼˜åŠ¿

å¦‚æœä¸å¹¸ç¢°åˆ°äº†ç›¸äº’ä¾èµ–çš„å­è¿ç®—ç»„æˆçš„è®¡ç®—, å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ "å¹¶è¡Œæµæ°´çº¿" æ¥åˆ©ç”¨å¤šæ ¸ä¼˜åŠ¿ - å¯ä»¥ç±»æ¯” cpuçš„æµæ°´çº¿å·¥ä½œæœºåˆ¶

// å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªåœ¨çº¿ç¨‹ä¹‹é—´æ•°æ®ä¼ é€’çš„è½½ä½“
public class Msg {

    public double i;
    public double j;
    public String orgStr = null;

}

// åŠ æ³• - æµæ°´çº¿ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
public class Plus implements Runnable {

    public static BlockingDeque<Msg> blockingDeque = new LinkedBlockingDeque<Msg>();

    @Override
    public void run() {
        while (true) {
            Msg msg = null;
            try {
                msg = blockingDeque.take();
                msg.i = msg.j + msg.i;
                Multiply.blockingDeque.add(msg);// ä¼ é€’ç»™ä¹˜æ³•çº¿ç¨‹ä¸­çš„queue
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

// ä¹˜æ³•
public class Multiply implements Runnable {
    public static BlockingDeque<Msg> blockingDeque = new LinkedBlockingDeque<Msg>();

    @Override
    public void run() {
        while (true) {
            Msg msg = null;
            try {
                msg = blockingDeque.take();
                msg.i = msg.j * msg.i;
                Div.blockingDeque.add(msg);// ä¼ é€’ç»™ é™¤æ³•
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

// é™¤æ³•
public class Div implements Runnable {
    public static BlockingDeque<Msg> blockingDeque = new LinkedBlockingDeque<Msg>();

    @Override
    public void run() {
        while (true) {
            Msg msg = null;
            try {
                msg = blockingDeque.take();
                msg.i = msg.i / 2;
                System.out.println(msg.orgStr + "=" + msg.i);// è¾“å‡ºæœ€ç»ˆç»“æœ
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }
}

// æµ‹è¯•
public class PStreamMain {
    public static void main(String args[]) {

        new Thread(new Plus()).start();
        new Thread(new Multiply()).start();
        new Thread(new Div()).start();

        // æäº¤ 100 ä¸‡ä¸ªè®¡ç®—è¯·æ±‚
        for (int i = 0; i <= 1000; i++) {
            for (int j = 0; j <= 1000; j++) {
                Msg msg = new Msg();
                msg.i = i;
                msg.j = j;
                msg.orgStr = "((" + i + "+" + j + ")*" + i + ")/2";
                Plus.blockingDeque.add(msg);
            }
        }
    }
}

14.12. å¹¶è¡Œæœç´¢â€‹

æœ‰åº - äºŒåˆ†æ³• æ— éœ€ - æŒ¨ä¸ªæŸ¥æ‰¾, æ›´å¥½çš„æ–¹æ³•: å¹¶è¡Œ

/**
 * Main
 */
public class Main {

    private static int[] arr;
    private static ExecutorService pool = Executors.newCachedThreadPool();
    private static final int thread_num = 2;
    private static AtomicInteger result = new AtomicInteger(-1);// å¤šä¸ª thread é€šè¿‡è¿™ä¸ªå…±äº«ä¿¡æ¯

    private static class SearchTask implements Callable<Integer> {

        private int begin;
        private int end;
        private int target;

        public SearchTask(int begin, int end, int target) {
            this.begin = begin;
            this.end = end;
            this.target = target;
        }

        @Override
        public Integer call() throws Exception {
            return search(target, begin, end);
        }

    }

    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
        arr = new int[] {2, 4, 5, 9, 11, 80, 294305, 777, 83};
        int index = parallelSearch(777);
        System.out.println("search finished, index=" + index);
    }

    private static int parallelSearch(int target) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
        ArrayList<Future<Integer>> re = new ArrayList<Future<Integer>>();

        int subArrSize = arr.length / (thread_num + 1);// å®æ„¿æ¯ä¸ªå­æ•°ç»„sizeå°ä¸€äº›, æ•°ç»„ä¸ªæ•°å¤šä¸€äº›
        for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i += subArrSize) {
            int end = i + subArrSize;
            if (end > arr.length) {// å¯ä»¥å»æ‰
                end = arr.length;
            }
            re.add(pool.submit(new SearchTask(i, end, target)));
        }

        for (Future<Integer> fu : re) {
            Integer i = fu.get();
            if (i >= 0) {
                return i;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }

    private static int search(int target, int begin, int end) {
        if (result.get() >= 0) {// another thread should has finished the search
            return result.get();
        }

        for (int i = begin; i < end; i++) {
            if (arr[i] == target) {
                boolean ok = result.compareAndSet(-1, i);// get the index of target, and put it into result;
                if (ok) {
                    return i;
                }
                // å¦‚æœè®¾ç½®å¤±è´¥, è¡¨ç¤ºå…¶ä»–çº¿ç¨‹æŠ¢å…ˆæ‰¾åˆ°äº†
                return result.get();
            }
        }
        // éå†å®Œè¿˜æ˜¯æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°, è¿”å› -1
        return -1;
    }

}

14.13. å¹¶è¡Œæ’åºâ€‹

ä¸€èˆ¬çš„æ’åºéƒ½æ˜¯ä¸²è¡Œçš„, è¿™é‡Œä»‹ç»å¹¶è¡Œçš„æ’åºç®—æ³•

14.13.1. æ”¹è¿›å†’æ³¡æ’åº-åˆ†ç¦»æ•°æ®ç›¸å…³æ€§-å¥‡å¶äº¤æ¢æ’åºâ€‹

å¯¹äºå†’æ³¡æ’åºä¸­çš„æŸä¸ªå…ƒç´ , å®ƒå¯èƒ½å’Œå‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ äº¤æ¢, ä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½åŒåä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ äº¤æ¢, æ•´ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç›¸äº’ä¾èµ–çš„æ•´ä½“, æ€ä¹ˆåˆ†ç¦»æˆå¤šä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†å‘¢?

å¥‡å¶äº¤æ¢æ’åº - å°†æ•´ä¸ªæ’åºè¿‡ç¨‹åˆ†ä¸ºä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†: å¥‡äº¤æ¢ - åªæ¯”è¾ƒå¥‡æ•°ç´¢å¼•çš„å…ƒç´ å’Œç›¸é‚»çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ; å¶äº¤æ¢ - åªæ¯”è¾ƒå¶æ•°ç´¢å¼•çš„å…ƒç´ åŠå…¶ç›¸é‚»çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ 

å¥‡å¶æ’åºç¤ºæ„å›¾: from here

å°†æ•´ä¸ªæ¯”è¾ƒåˆ†å‰²ä¸º ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ å¥‡é˜¶æ®µ, å¶é˜¶æ®µ. åœ¨æ¯ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µå†…, æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ¯”è¾ƒäº¤æ¢æ²¡æœ‰ç›¸äº’ä¾èµ–, so æ¯æ¬¡æ¯”è¾ƒéƒ½å¯ä»¥ç‹¬ç«‹æ‰§è¡Œ

public class Main {

    private static int[] arr;

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        arr = new int[] { 763, 203, 2, 32, 8, 99, 455, 777, 343, 234 };
        bubbleSort(arr);
        
        for (int i : arr) {
            
            System.out.print(i+", ");//2, 8, 32, 99, 203, 234, 343, 455, 763, 777,
        }
    }

    //æ™®é€šçš„å†’æ³¡æ’åº:
    public static void bubbleSort(int[] arr) {
        for (int i = arr.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
            for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) {
                if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) {
                    int tmp = arr[j];
                    arr[j] = arr[j + 1];
                    arr[j + 1] = tmp;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    // ä¸²è¡Œçš„å¥‡å¶å†’æ³¡æ’åº
    public static void oddEvenSort(int[] arr) {
        boolean exch = true;// æœ¬æ¬¡å¾ªç¯æ˜¯å¦è¿›è¡Œäº†æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢
        int startIndex = 0;// 1: å¥‡äº¤æ¢, 0: å¶äº¤æ¢

        while (exch || startIndex == 1) {// å¦‚æœä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯å‘ç”Ÿäº†äº¤æ¢ or å¥‡äº¤æ¢, é‡å¤å¾ªç¯
                                    // å½“æ²¡æœ‰å…ƒç´ äº¤æ¢, ä¸”å½“å‰è¿›è¡Œçš„æ˜¯å¶äº¤æ¢ - é€€å‡ºå¾ªç¯
            exch = false;

            for (int i = startIndex; i < arr.length - 1; i += 2) {
                if (arr[i] > arr[i+1]) {
                    int tmp = arr[i];
                    arr[i] = arr[i+1];
                    arr[i+1] = tmp;

                    exch = true;
                }
            }

            if (startIndex == 0) {
                startIndex = 1;
            } else {
                startIndex = 0;
            }
        }
    }
}
